name: Ultron I
desc: Forced Response: After Ultron attacks you, choose to either place 1 threat on the main scheme or put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a Drone Minion.

name: Ultron II
desc: Forced Response: After Ultron attacks you, choose to either place 1 threat on the main scheme or put the top card of your deck into play facedown, engaged with you as a Drone Minion. Until the end of this attack, Ultron gets +1 ATK for each Drone minion engaged with you.

name: Ultron III
desc: Each Drone minion gets +1 ATK and +1 hit point. Ultron cannot take damage while a Drone minion is in play.

name: Advanced Ultron Drone
desc: Guard. Forced Interrupt: When Advanced Ultron Drone is defeated, the engaged player puts the top card of their deck into play facedown, engaged with them as a Drone Minion.

name: Madame Hydra
desc: Madame Hydra cannot take damage while the Legions of Hydra side scheme is in play. Forced Response: After Madame Hydra schemes or attacks, place 2 threat on the Legions of Hydra side scheme.

name: Hydra Soldier
desc: Guard. When Defeated: Deal the engaged player an encounter card.

name: Radioactive Man
desc: Forced Response: After Radioactive Man attacks you, discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Whirlwind
desc: Forced Interrupt: When Whirlwind attacks you, also resolve his attack against each other hero.

name: Tiger Shark
desc: Forced Response: After Tiger Shark attacks, give him a tough status card.

name: Melter
desc: The engaged player must defend against Melter's attacks with an ally they control, if able.

name: MODOK
desc: Retaliate 2.

name: Green Goblin I
desc: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Green Goblin II
desc: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

name: Green Goblin III
desc: Forced Response: After Green Goblin attacks and damages you, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

name: Goblin Knight
desc: Forced Response: After Goblin Knight attacks you, discard 1 card from the encounter deck. If that card is a Goblin minion, put it into play engaged with you.

name: Goblin Soldier
desc: When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to the engaged player.

desc: Guard.

name: Private Security Specialist

name: Scorpion
desc: Quickstrike. Forced Response: After Scorpion attacks and damages a character, stun that character.

name: Electro
desc: Forced Response: After Electro attacks you, discard 1 card from the encounter deck. Take 1 indirect damage for each boost icon discarded this way.

name: Tombstone
desc: Forced Response: After tombstone attacks and damages you, discard a MENTAL or PHYSICAL resource from your hand, if able.

name: Titania
desc: ATK is equal to Titania's remaining hit points.

name: Vulture

name: Killmonger
desc: Killmonger cannot take damage from Black Panther upgrades.

name: Yon-Rogg

name: Taskmaster
desc: Taskmaster gets +1 SCH and +1 ATK for each upgrade Black Widow controls.

desc: Guard.

name: Loki
desc: Interrupt: When Loki would be defeated, discard the top card of the encounter deck. If that card is a trechery, heal all damage from Loki instead.

desc: Toughness.

name: Thomas Edison
desc: Thomas Edison cannot take damage while you are engaged with another minion.

name: Edison's Giant Robot
desc: Edison's Giant Robot cannot take damage. Hero Action: Spend a MENTAL resource. Until the end of the phase, treat this card's printed text box as if it were blank.

name: Whiplash
desc: Retaliate 1.

name: Baron Zemo
desc: Quickstrike. While Baron Zemo is engaged with you, you cannot thwart.
